trans-unit.source: Configures run-time throughput settings that enable you to tune service performance.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceThrottlingBehavior"></xref> class.
Use the constructor when adding a configured <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceThrottlingBehavior>programmatically.
Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of messages actively processing across a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost"></xref>.
The upper limit of active messages in the service.
The default is 16 times the processor count.
Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> objects in the service that can execute at one time.
The maximum number of <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> objects in the service at one time.

The default is the sum of the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceThrottlingBehavior.MaxConcurrentSessions*> and the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceThrottlingBehavior.MaxConcurrentCalls*>..
Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of sessions a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost"></xref> object can accept at one time.
The maximum number of sessions a service host accepts.
The default is 100 times the processor count.
Configures the bindings to support the service behavior.
Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A> method.
The service description.
The host for the service.
The endpoints exposed by the service.
The binding parameters to be configured to support the service behavior.
Configures the service to support the service behavior.
Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A> method.
The service description to be configured.
The host for the service.
Validates that the service and host can support the service behavior.
Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.Validate%2A> method.
The service description to be validated by the service behavior.
The service host to be validated by the service behavior.
